HappyCouple

It start in this beautiful New York City. We met in a small restaurant and keep contact from that night. A happy chatting always with us every day and every night. One day we decided to met again at that restaurant. It was our first date, a date that we will never forget it, a date that freeze everything, a very nervous date, with a full of happiness It start in this beautiful New York City.
